thread.section_title: Hotel Parisiana - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Value
thread.title_full: Great Value - Review of Hotel Parisiana, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Rosscoe68
title: Great Value
text:
Really great value , easy walk from the main station, great friendly staff, room was very comfortable ( three adults ) walkable to the opera district, wonderful places to eat and drink nearby, great value for paris.
The hotel is set in a wonderful Parisian building, the second building over the court yard does not have a lift.
